summary: This appears to be a confidential email header or document reference from a Bureau of Prisons official, containing a link to a news article about Jeffrey Epstein's life in prison. The document is marked as confidential and part of the SDNY case files.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the linked news article about his life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: News Article on Epstein's Prison Life
events.description: A news article is published detailing Jeffrey Epstein's life behind bars at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, NY, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a confidential record from the SDNY case files (SDNY_00011536).
It references a news article dated July 26, 2019, about Jeffrey Epstein's life in prison.
The correspondence originates from a U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons email address.
The document is associated with the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York where Epstein was held.
